text: Ray Adduono (born January 21, 1947 in Fort William, Ontario) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey player who played 221 games in the World Hockey Association. He played for the Indianapolis Racers, Cleveland Crusaders, Minnesota Fighting Saints, and San Diego Mariners. == References == * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Hershey Bears players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Eastern Hockey League players
title: Ray Adduono
